name: Secrets of Magic 2: Witches and Wizards
name_original: Secrets of Magic 2: Witches and Wizards
description:
After learning the fine art of magic and becoming a true witch, Victoria is ready to go after Agnes and set her parents free. Witches and wizards united in the fight against evil!
Dive into an exciting adventure by matching your way through a magical and dangerous land to defeat the ultimate evil. Grab your wand and prepare for battle in Secrets of Magic 2: Witches and Wizards.Features
  • Activate the most powerful amulet to break an evil spell
  • Tons of unique and challenging levels
  • 4 game play modes: challenge, relaxed, expert, and casual
  • Exciting match-3 gameplay
  • Collect coins to boost your power-ups
  • Plan your moves to get all three starsh
